title: On Friday,2/20/15, there was a strong odor of what smelled like cat spray in the area around Long Leaf mall. My chemistry background suggests it is an amine compound. Seems like this happens about once a month. Can you tell where it is coming from? Thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2010/02/what-causes-an-odor-like-cat-urine-that-is-sometimes-in-the-air-around-here/
